main event: A Kentucky State Policeman observed a bright circular object with reddish lights on December 31, 1963, in Frankfort, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object approached rapidly from behind the police cruiser, It illuminated the entire highway as it got closer, The police car's engine stalled and radio went dead when the object passed over, The object was approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter and had no visible structural members, After passing, the object accelerated rapidly and disappeared from sight.
sighted object: circular or disc-shaped object with reddish or orangish lights
witness description: Kentucky State Policeman driving alone on U.S. highway 127
